text:
Yep! Our team has been using lottie for the past year or so for more robust animations. Typically I’ll do it one of two ways:
• <https://lottiefiles.com/web-player|Simple Web Player Embed>
• Advanced control with JS methods and events (<https://github.com/LottieFiles/lottie-player|see github docs>)
Either way, I’ll do it in a custom module with a file field for the lottie JSON file at a minimum…sometimes more fields for advanced control if necessary.
